Alice.note_to_self: Expansion plan: Road to Node 10, then settlement on Node 10 or move to the 3:1 port at Node 9. Second settlement priority: Wheat and Ore (aim for Nodes 42, 43, or 31).

Bob.note_to_self: Path set: Node 12 -> 13 -> 14 to secure Wheat (8). Secondary goal: reach the Brick port at Node 6/7. For my second settlement, I must prioritize Ore and Wheat, ideally looking at nodes like 41 or 42 if they remain open, or settling at Node 14 if I can reach it quickly.
